CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 16, 1961, pg. A3 reads:" ' New Era' Dawns at Herron Hill Junior High - Guiding Herron - Among those guiding Herron Hill Junior High School are Principal John H. Morgart, who is shown conferring with, left to right: Jodie Harris, vice principal; Francis L. Haggerty, counselor; Mrs. Olliemae H. Guice, activities director and girls' adviser, and George R. Devel, vice principal in charge of activities."
TitMainTitle: Principal of Herron Hill Junior High School John H. Morgart, seated at desk across from left to right: Jodie Harris, Francis L. Haggerty, Olliemae H. Guice, and George R. Devel, another version
